Posts.Content: I'm so scared. I'm 37 and had a lump checked on ultrasound and has come up very suspicious. Had mammogram today and another ultrasound and needle biopsy. Surgeon is 90% sure it's cancer, get results as to how bad on Friday. I am not coping at all. The lump is 16mm so they say it's not big. I'm desperately hoping they can treat me and it hasn't spread. I have no history in my family and check my breasts all the time due to having cysts. I don't know how long this lump has been there, I felt it a few days ago. But not sure if it's been longer as I was pregnant but had a miscarriage 2 months ago so my breasts were swollen and sore and lumpy. I'm trying so hard to think positively but I am losing that battle.. I just want my life to go back to normal.
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer

Posts.Content: Thank you girls for your support, news not good but not end of the world. Have BC, ILC. Have to have surgery then chemo, then radiation, the full freaking whamo. I'll know more after surgery as to how bad but at this stage surgeon seems to think it's early. who knows. this sucks. big hugs to you all!! xxxxxxxx
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer

Posts.Content: Oh Mary, I will be thinking of you, it's just so scary and unbelieveable. Pls let me know how you go. The waiting is the worst. The only thing that is keeping me upright is my husband (I love him so so much) and these boards where so many wonderful women are helping each other through this crap. Hugs 2u xx
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer

Posts.Content: I am scheduled for lumpectomy in 2 weeks. I am seeing a fetility specialist this week, then the surgeon again on Friday. I am shaking today. I want my life back. AS we all do hey.
Posts.Title: Help, tests confirm 90% probable cancer
